name: WP-Translations Badges
author: fxbenard

sections.description:
Display WP-Translations badges on your website with Shortcode or Widget. Nothing less, nothing more, simple as that.

Features

  • Alignment
  • Translator, Developer, Donor, and Supporter badges
  • Badges link to Transifex user page or project

Contributing and reporting bugs

You want to translate, help, or improve a translation.
Join our WP-Translations Community at WP-Translations

More info at WP-Translations.org

You can contribute code to this plugin via GitHub

Translations Included

  • বাংলা (Bengali)
  • Français (French)
  • Português do Brasil (Brazilian Portuguese)
  • ភាសាខ្មែរ (Khmer)
  • Türkçe (Turkish)
  • Deutsch (German)
  • Italiano (Italian)
  • Ελληνικά (Greek)
  • Nederlands (Dutch)
  • Slovenčina (Slovak)

Thanks to all WP-Translations teams members, you rock and make a real difference…

Support

If you spot a bug, you can of course log it on GitHub

Or contact us on wpt@wp-translations.org
sections.installation:
From your WordPress Website

Go to Plugins and then search for “WP-Translations Badges”. A few more clicks and that’s it.

Manual Installation

Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from the Plugins page.

Ready for WP 4.6.1

1.0.8 (Aug 13, 2015)

Ready for WP 4.3
Update translations

Fixe bad function call
Update translations

1.0.6 (Sept 09, 2014)

Ready for WP 4.0
Add Nederlands (Dutch) & Slovenčina (Slovak) languages props @wpt-teams

1.0.5 (July 31, 2014)

Add missing file
Added Ελληνικά (Greek) language props @wpt-teams

1.0.4 (July 8, 2014)

Badge links now to Transifex user or project page props @grappler
Add Türkçe (Turkish), Deutsch (German), Italiano (Italian) languages props @wpt-teams

1.0.3 (May 13, 2014)

  • Fix badge centering issue props @danbpfr
  • Add Khmer and Brazilian languages props @wpt-teams
  • Fix typos errors
  • Optimise images size

1.0.2 (May 2, 2014)

  • Fix styling props @myles
  • Add links to GH and Transifex props @benhuson

1.0.1 (April 30, 2014)

  • Fork and Ready to Badge

1.0 (April 29, 2014)

  • First Release by tripflex
